name: Notice.AAA6.ClaimantIntent.SettlementAgreement.DefendantAccepted.Defendant
descriptionEn: You have accepted the settlement agreement (opens in a new tab). The claimant cannot request a County Court Judgment (CCJ), unless you break the terms of the agreement.
descriptionCy: Rydych wedi derbyn y cytundeb setlo (yn agor mewn tab newydd). Ni all yr hawlydd wneud cais am Ddyfarniad Llys Sirol (CCJ) oni bai eich bod yn torri telerauâ€™r cytundeb.
